title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 44.0 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 44.0 - Purpose

State Regulations

This regulation governs the use of market-value adjustment formulae in determining cash surrender benefits, the use of withdrawal charges and the availability of cash surrender values under individual deferred annuities subject to section
4223
of the Insurance Law, and the funding and reserves for such annuities with market-value adjustments. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
44.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
